availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Moses West (Independence, Kentucky, stage coach driver)

body.p: Independence, Kentucky, stage coach driver. Ohio native. Married to Mary A. West. Father of Margaret J. West and Susan J. West. Stage coach driver in Independence in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Independence, p. 2; Find A Grave, "Moses West (1816-)," Memorial #86805562, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=86805562&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017).
